EmailTemplate.name: Quote Approved
EmailTemplate.subject: Salesforce : Your Quote has been approved by the manager
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Quote.CreatedBy},
Your Quote {!Quote.Name} has been aproved by your manager.
From now, you can start prepare the PDF proposal et send it by email to your customer.
To start working on it, you can open the related quote by clicking on this link : https://login/salesforce/.com/{!Quote.Id}
Regards, Your Salesforce administrator
Note : This email has been sent automatically. Do not answer to it.
